differences.gitbook: Marketing Budget Cap and Tiers: Kizzy presented the current budget cap, highlighting the limited allocation to the Marketing Guild — approximately half of the proposed amount. He also criticized the guild's lack of involvement in governance meetings. Ashley suggested that the budget cap should be reviewed and adjusted regularly to ensure alignment with priorities. Ayo proposed merging some guilds to optimize resource allocation and collaboration.
